author: Joe Parkinson
title: South African Police Raid Gupta Family’s Compound
text:
JOHANNESBURG—Faced with a no-confidence vote that will likely oust him, President Jacob Zuma dug his heels in harder, warning of violence should he be removed from office.
“Nobody has ever provided the reason [for why I should resign],” Mr. Zuma, who has faced corruption allegations since​before taking office in 2009, said in an interview with state television on Wednesday. “Nobody’s saying what have I done.”
The...
